source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a high-angle, daytime shot of a large, reddish-brown bascule bridge spanning a wide city river. The bridge is occupied by a convoy of military tanks. Several tour boats and other vessels are present in the water below and around the bridge.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a high-angle, daytime shot of a large, reddish-brown bascule bridge spanning a wide city river. The bridge is occupied by a convoy of military tanks. Several tour boats and other vessels are present in the water below and around the bridge.

generated_critique: The caption fails to describe the motion of the subjects, which is the central requirement of the instruction. It currently provides a static description of the scene rather than detailing the actions within it. The caption should be rewritten to describe the movement of the various boats on the river and to note that the tanks on the bridge are stationary. For example: "Several boats travel along the river; a white tour boat and a speedboat move from right to left in the background, while an orange tour boat moves from left to right in the foreground. A convoy of military tanks remains stationary on the bridge above."
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: In a high-angle, daytime shot of a city river, several boats are in motion. A large white tour boat and a speedboat travel from right to left in the background, while an orange tour boat moves from left to right in the foreground. Above them, a convoy of military tanks remains stationary on a large, reddish-brown bascule bridge that spans the water.
